title: This Bykski external cooler is bigger than your PC
description: The Bykski B-1080-CEC-X is an external cooler with cold exhaust heat dissipation that you can set up next to your tower, because forget minimalism.

title: MSI’s massive curved monitor may be a gamer’s dream machine
description: MSI has just unveiled an impressive new monitor that combines some of the most in-demand features in one massive package.
